ygData.subject: Re: Re: faq
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Druids as far as I know cannot help atk speed, or help mana regen Shamen cannot help mana regen or cast a damage shield or provide a snare like effect.
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> On Fri, 17 Dec 1999, Jason Rochelle wrote:
>
> >> Q: Why can't Bards do <foo> as well as <other really buff class>?
> >> A: Well, simply put, we're the "Jack of all Trades, Master of None."
>
> >I was perusing a Shaman mail list and found out they think THEY are
> >"jack of all trades, master of none". I wounder how many other classes
> >have been to this? :)
>
> Um. Druids makes 3.
>
> WIZARDS, OTOH, complain that the jack of all trades can do their mastery
> as well as they can.
>

Druids as far as I know cannot help atk speed, or help mana regen

Shamen cannot help mana regen or cast a damage shield or provide a snare
like effect.

Bards are the only real jacks of all trades.
